info.title: Coral Companion API Documentation
info.description: Documentation for the API used in the Coral Companion app

license.name: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International

get.description: Get all characters from the database

post.description: Create a new character using the data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized. Only admins can create characters

message.example: You are not authorized to create a character

get.description: Get a character by ID sent in the URL from the database

put.description: Update a character by ID in the URL and data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can update characters

message.example: You are not authorized to update a character

delete.description: Delete a character by ID sent in the URL (Admin only)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the character to delete

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can delete characters

message.example: You are not authorized to delete a character

get.description: Returns all crops from the database
Returns a crop from the database

message.example: No crop found with given id

get.description: Get all families from the database

post.description: Create a new family using the data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can create a family

message.example: You are not authorized to create a family

get.description: Get a family by ID in the URL

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the family to return

put.description: Update a family by ID in the URL and data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the family to update

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can update a family

message.example: You are not authorized to update a family

delete.description: Delete a family by ID sent in the URL. (Admin only)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the family to delete

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can delete a family

message.example: You are not authorized to delete a family

get.description: Get all favorite lists from the database

post.description: Create a new favorite list using the data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized. Only admins can create new favorite lists

message.example: You are not authorized to create a favorite list

get.description: Get a favorite lists by the ID in the URL

404.description: Not Found: Favorite list doesn't exist

message.example: Favorite list with id 1 not found

put.description: Update a favorite list by ID in the URL and data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized

message.example: You are not authorized to update a favorite list

404.description: Not Found: Favorite list doesn't exist

message.example: Favorite list with id 2 not found

delete.description: Deletes a favorite list by ID in the URL. (Admin only)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the favorite list to be deleted

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can delete favorite lists

message.example: You are not authorized to delete a favorite list

404.description: Not found: Favorite list doesn't exist

message.example: Favorite list with id 2 not found

get.description: Get all items from the database

post.description: Create a new item using the data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can create items

message.example: You are not authorized to create an item

get.description: Get an item using the id provided in the request URL

put.description: Update an item by ID in the URL and data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can update items

message.example: You are not authorized to update an item

delete.description: Delete an item by ID sent in the URL. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can delete items

message.example: You are not authorized to delete an item

get.description: Get all profiles from the database

post.description: Create a new profile using the data provided in the request body. The user must be an admin to create a profile for other users. An user can create a profile for themselves (user_id not required).

400.description: Bad request: The request you sent was invalid

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins or the user themselves can create a profile

message.example: You are not authorized to create a profile

get.description: Get a profile by ID in the URL

put.description: Update a profile by ID in the URL and data provided in the request body. Admins can update any profile, users can only update their own profiles

200.description: Success: Profile has been updated successfully

message.example: The farmer name field is required

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins or the user who created the profile can update it

message.example: You are not authorized to update this profile

delete.description: Delete a profile by ID in the URL. Admins can delete any profile, users can only delete their own profiles

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins or the user who created the profile can delete it

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this profile

post.description: Register a new user with a unique email given in the request body
Login a user with an email and password given in the request body

401.description: Invalid login details
Unauthenticated: The user must be logged in to log out

get.summary: Check if the token is valid
get.description: Check if the token is valid.

401.description: Unauthenticated: Invalid token

get.description: Returns all seasons from the database
Get a season by ID in the URL
Returns all seasonal crops from the database

404.description: Not found: Seasonal crops don't exist

message.example: No seasonal crops found for this season

get.description: Get all tasks from the database

post.description: Create a new task using the data provided in the request body. (Admins can create tasks for other users)

401.description: Unauthorized: Tasks can only be created by admins or the user themself

message.example: You are not authorized to create a task

get.description: Get a task by ID sent in the URL from the database

put.description: Update a task by ID sent in the URL and data provided in the request body. Only the user who created the task and admins can update it.

message.example: The isCompleted field must be 0 or 1

401.description: Unauthorized: Only the user who created the task and admins can update it

message.example: You are not authorized to update this task

delete.description: Delete a task by ID sent in the URL. Only the user who created the task and admins can delete it.

401.description: You are not authorized to delete this task

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this task

get.description: Get a task by the profile ID sent in the URL from the database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of profile of tasks to return

200.description: Success: Returns all tasks from a profile

get.description: Get all types from the database

post.description: Create a new type using the data provided in the request body.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only admins can create types

message.example: You are not authorized to create a type

get.description: Get a type by ID sent in the URL from the database

put.description: Update a type by ID in the URL and data provided in the request body. (Admin only)

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can update types

message.example: You are not authorized to update a type

delete.description: Delete a type by ID sent in the URL (Admin only)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the type to delete

401.description: Unauthorized: Only admins can delete types

message.example: You are not authorized to delete a type

get.description: Returns all users from the database or a message if no users found

200.description: Success: Returns an array of all users

get.description: Get an user by ID sent in the URL from the database or a message the user is not found

404.description: Not found: User with given id doesn't exist
